title: Quantum-Resilient Privacy Ledger (QRPL): A Sovereign Digital Currency for the Post-Quantum Era
summary: The emergence of quantum computing presents profound challenges to existing cryptographic infrastructures, whilst the development of central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) has raised concerns regarding privacy preservation and excessive centralisation in digital payment systems.
